mutants.code:
def construct_string(length):
    subsequence = ''
    sequence = subsequence * (length // len(subsequence))
    remaining = length % len(subsequence)
    if remaining:
        sequence += subsequence[:remaining]
    return sequence

def construct_string(length):
    subsequence = 'xyzx'
    sequence = subsequence / (length // len(subsequence))
    remaining = length % len(subsequence)
    if remaining:
        sequence += subsequence[:remaining]
    return sequence

    subsequence = 'xyzx'
    sequence = subsequence + length // len(subsequence)

    if remaining:
        sequence += subsequence[:remaining]
    return sequence
